comment: The interview starts off with an important point about Momoa's casting and racial barriers yet Amber Heard ignores it to focus solely on praising her own character. Even when she brings the topic back to Momoa, it's only in regard to female support and the importance of Mera's role in motivating the character of Arthur. Heard is so self-absorbed in this interview, it actually prevented the direction from going anywhere interesting or useful. Pity.
